pageProps.title: My linux setup
pageProps.content:
My linux setup

  • Laptop
    • Popos
      • Applications
        • Visual studio code
        • Firefox and Brave for testing
        • Konsole terminal emulator
      • Desktop environment
        • kde plasma
  • Desktop
    • ArchLinux
      • Applications
        • Firefox
        • Visual studio code
        • Alacritty
      • Desktop environment
        • Sway on wayland
  • Server
    • Ubuntu Server
      • Applications
        • Nodejs
        • Deno
        • Git
        • SSH
        • PM2
        • + many more programs
      • Desktop environment
        • none i use ssh for everything
